basic_information.scholarship_name: Edmond Board of REALTORS Veterans Support Scholarship

description: To support a UCO Student who meets the following criteria: Eligibility Requirements Students must have completed 60 credit hours at UCO Combined minimum 2.50 GPA Student must have financial need Student must be an honorably discharged veteran, active duty member of the Armed Forces, or current member of the national Guard or Reserve and a U.S. Citizen Discharged veterans must provide a copy of DD214 or provide appropriate proof (orders, CAC, etc.) Participation in Veterans Upward Bound and/or SSS Veterans  SALUTE is preferred

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
